Array: So THAT's what all the ruckus was!
And what brings you to my delectable estate?
The Dweller cursed our friend. We need a soul stone.
Oh?
And I suppose I should simply give you one, then?
I have a better idea!
How about the three of you join my army... permanently?
In your dreams!
Oh, look at you, taking courteous erotesis all seriously...
You did barge in here uninvited and cause irreparable damage to my property, did you not?
Seems only fair you would compensate me for my troubles.
Don't get too confident, they are fully-trained Solstice Warriors.
Ha! This is getting interesting!
Are you like these Solena and Luan wannabes who thought they would ascend by fighting me?
What?
An irrelevant matter, much like your very selves.
Let us begin. And don't worry, you won't stay dead for long!
Gah...
(Children, I swear...)
(I'm not about to die over a stupid rock!)
I yield... for now.
Here's your soul stone.
Now go away!
We...
WHAT NOW!?
We also need a green flame, otherwise the Ferryman won't take us back...
You... do want us to go, don't you?
(The nerve...)
(THE DISRESPECT!!!)
Grab a bottle from my desk, then GET OFF OF MY ESTATE!
Count your blessings. If we meet again, it won't be a simple three-versus-one.
Three-versus-one? But you summoned-
LEAVE!!!
We got what we needed, let's hurry back.
Back to Garl. Finally.
Press <button="Cancel"> to throw the Graplou.
It can attach to grapple points, enemies, and climbable surfaces.

It can attach to grapple points, enemies, and climbable surfaces.
